abort.no_devices_found: No devices found on the network
abort.single_instance_allowed: Already configured. Only a single configuration possible.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to F&F Fox device. Check RestAPI key and WiFi connection.

confirm.description: Do you want to start set up?

discovering_summary.description:
We found {devices_amount} F&F Fox devices. 
 Go forward to configure them. Have RESTApi access keys ready - You can find it in Fox mobile application.

configure_device.description:
You are configuring F&F Fox device identified by following id: {device_id} and IP address: {device_host}. 
 Fill the name of the device or leave empty to get it from F&F Fox device. 
 If you configured F&F Fox device with no auth key, 000 key will be used as default.

progress.task: We are discovering F&F Fox devices in your local network.
